name: Unnamed Stickman Meteor Escape Game in 2D
name_original: Unnamed Stickman Meteor Escape Game in 2D
description:
How long can you survive the meteor shower?

So I've been learning Unity for 2 months now and this is the first game I've created. Come and follow my journey learning game development on YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCremCWVi_9ssQbdxCxvcppw

Anyway, I hope you enjoy playing my game.

CONTROLS
a = left
d = right
space = jump

chrisseyTee
